Health insurance gap will be closed, Seymour vows after Herald reporting on cancer patients missing out https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/health-insurance-gap-will-be-close-seymour-vows-after-herald-reporting-on-cancer-病人-missing-out/FVBNQMUDBRDUTHUA7E3JKPS55Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/health-insurance-gap-will-be-close-seymour-vows-after-herald-reporting-on-cancer-病人-missing-out/FVBNQMUDBRDUTHUA7E3JKPS55Y/ Nicholas JonesA Medsafe technicality is seeing people miss out on desperately-needed funds. Wed, 03 Apr 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Retired GP Logan McLennan, with wife Robin McLennan, has multiple myeloma, a type of blood cancer, and needs drugs that are not funded by Pharmac. His health insurance will not contribute to the cost, because the particular combination of medicines is not approved by Medsafe.
